description: Change of use of former golf course (Use Class F2) to provide a football training centre (Sui Generis) and parkland (Use Class F2), comprising the provision of football pitches and associated infrastructure; change of use and modifications to the existing Northern Clubhouse building to provide football training centre and associated uses (Sui Generis); restoration and enhancement of parkland landscape, including new footpaths; modifications to existing Southern Clubhouse to form a replacement caf√©, public toilets and associated parking; demolition of existing grounds maintenance building and construction of replacement grounds maintenance building; construction of gatehouse; hard and soft landscaping works to include land reprofiling; new vehicular and pedestrian access, and modifications to existing vehicular and pedestrian access; and associated works.
site_name: Former Whitewebbs Park Golf CourseWhitewebbs RoadEnfieldEN2
